This final note today, which...I just...can't, really.

A survey from a mobile payments company called Jumio. They do a study called Mobile Consumer Habits, from which we learned today that one in 10 American adults use their smartphones during sex.

Among 18-34-year-olds, it's one in five. Twenty -- yes 20 -- percent. During sex.

Left unreported, was how partners felt about it.
teaser: A new survey finds that one in 10 American adults admits to using a smartphone during sex. And among 18-34-year-olds, it's one in five.
title: A whole new meaning to the term 'sexting'
